shared.facades

Class FacadeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.facades.FacadeManager

  • public class FacadeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This manager creates a simple way to update and create all facades at once.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      FacadeManager(ClientModel cm)
      Init the Facade manager with the starting clientModel

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(ClientModel cm)
        Updates all facades with a new model
        Precondition:
        cm is a valid ClientModel.
        Postcondition:
        Will update all the facades with the new ClientModel
